team.title: Our Team!
team.description: We are a dynamic group of individuals passionate about what we do and dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients.

news.title: Latest News

services.hero_subtitle: Quick, quality and affordable - see our offer.
services.main_text:
Our institution offers the following services:

- ** Photocopying and balls **: Copy and print documents in black and white and color variants, various formats (A4 and A3). Copy price: A4 one-sided from 1.8 to 5 dinars per page, A3 from 5 to 12 dinars per page. Color printing: from 10 to 25 dinars per page. Document scan: 15 dinars per page.

- ** Bookbinding services **: Professional binding and production of cover for graduate works, doctoral dissertations and other documents. The price of connectivity of graduate work (hard link): 354 dinars per work. Connection scripts: from 118 to 236 dinars per script. Creation of cover: from 354 to 708 dinars per piece. Restoration of old books: Price negotiable.

Our expert team is available to you for any questions and additional information. Visit us or contact us to inform yourself more detailed about all services and current prices.

validation.name_string: Library name must be a string.
validation.name_max: Library name may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.address_max: Address may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.pib_regex: Tax ID (PIB) must contain exactly 8 or 9 digits.
validation.phone_regex: Phone may only contain digits, spaces, plus, dashes and parentheses.
validation.phone_max: Phone may not be greater than 50 characters.
validation.email_max: Email may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.facebook_max: Facebook URL may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.twitter_max: Twitter URL may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.work_hours_string: Working hours must be a string.
validation.map_embed_url: Enter a valid Google Maps URL.
validation.map_embed_max: Google Maps URL may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.copyrights_string: Copyright text must be a string.
validation.copyrights_max: Copyright text may not be greater than 255 characters.
validation.logo_light_image: Light logo must be an image.
validation.logo_light_max: Light logo may not be larger than 2MB.
validation.logo_dark_image: Dark logo must be an image.
validation.logo_dark_max: Dark logo may not be larger than 2MB.
